A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's Meh. It's not a bad movie by any means. Its great. It's just not a great star wars film. There's a certain lack of character development that was apparent in this and TFA compared to the original trilogy and even the prequels.

There are a lot of scenes that seem skimmed over\,  rushed and lazy.

It's a movie where I think they should have focused less on cool fight scenes and more on character development with Rey and Luke and everyone. We are 2 movies into the new sequels and I feel like the directors don't even know which actor plays who at this point.
